mapper.insert: insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{deposit}, #{rentMoney}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "rent", "office")

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{dealAmount}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "deal", "office")

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{deposit}, #{rentMoney}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "rent", "home")

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dealcate, housecate) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{dealAmount}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gunguCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, "deal", "home")

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, deposit, rentmoney, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dongcode) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{deposit}, #{rentMoney}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gugunCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, #{dongCode})

insert into deal_data (area, dealday, dealmonth, dealyear, dealamount, floor, dong, guguncode, buildyear, name, jibun, dongcode) values (#{area}, #{dealDay}, #{dealMonth}, #{dealYear}, #{dealAmount}, #{floor}, #{dong}, #{gugunCode}, #{buildYear}, #{name}, #{jibun}, #{dongCode})
insert into apartment (aptCode, aptName, sido, gugun, dong, bjdCode) values (#{aptCode}, #{aptName}, #{sido}, #{gugun}, #{dong}, #{bjdCode})
insert into aptbasic (aptCode, aptName, aptAddr, dongCnt, aptTel, aptCnt, hoCnt, bjdCode) values (#{aptCode}, #{aptName}, #{aptAddr}, #{dongCnt}, #{aptTel}, #{aptCnt}, ${hoCnt}, #{bjdCode})

insert into aptdetail (aptCode, aptName, mgrCnt, secuCnt, eleCnt, parkUCnt, parkDCnt, cctvCnt,welFac, disBus, subLine, subStation, disSub, convFac, eduFac) values (#{aptCode}, #{aptName}, #{mgrCnt}, #{secuCnt}, #{eleCnt}, #{parkUCnt}, #{parkDCnt}, #{cctvCnt}, #{welFac}, #{disBus}, #{subLine}, #{subStation}, #{disSub}, #{convFac}, #{eduFac})
